title: Club missing?
body:
I've been in a club for a few years now, but I can't seem to interact with it. My friends say that they can see me in there, but I don't see it. I took a little over a year off from the game, so maybe something updated and I wasn't transitioned over?

I created a test club and can do things with that, but not my previous club(s).

I searched the forum and found a few people that had this same issue a few months ago, but it looked like it needed to be manually fixed.

Is there a way I can fix that?

replies.body: Yo shoot me the name of the club you can't seem to get working! Right now all I can see on my end is what seems like the temp club you made, so it does look like a usual error I can fix up in a jiffy. Send me that club name and I'll hop right on it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AMnXfL8b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T03:55:23.856+0000)
>
> Yo shoot me the name of the club you can't seem to get working! Right now all I can see on my end is what seems like the temp club you made, so it does look like a usual error I can fix up in a jiffy. Send me that club name and I'll hop right on it!

Thanks! I think it was "Siege My Donger" and our tag was "uSMDok" because we're basically children LOL

HAH! No worries with a little fun as long as it's not offensive or explicit ^_^.

Aaaaaand there we go. Let me know if you see it now fam.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AMnXfL8b,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-15T04:19:03.125+0000)
>
> HAH! No worries with a little fun as long as it's not offensive or explicit ^_^.
> 
> Aaaaaand there we go. Let me know if you see it now fam.

Hey I forgot to get back to you, sorry about that, but it worked perfectly! Thank you so much for the help!
